website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Yard Trainer is one that can offer a lot to its wearers. The shoe has a comfortable fit fresh out of the box. It has a supportive and lightweight feel as well. Boasting a great look and a great price, anyone will be hard-pressed to find flaws in this pair.
pros: Most users of the Under Armour Yard Trainer love how comfortable this baseball cleat is
This cleat’s fit is great right out of the box, note a significant number of wearers
A handful of reviews state that the baseball shoe is lightweight
Several customers like the supportive fit of this Under Armour baseball shoe
A couple of reviewers say that they would highly recommend this cleat
The pair has a great look says a reviewer
Another shopper likes the shoe’s price
The traction delivered by this cleat is excellent, a wearer points out
cons: A couple of users say that the shoe is too narrow for their liking
One customer says that the shoe’s laces don’t stay tied all the time

customer_reviews.title: Great confort
customer_reviews.text: I have a broken fibre and I can slip then on without tiring the shoe each time
customer_reviews.author: Ronald w.

customer_reviews.title: the support these give is amazing. No ankle rolling
customer_reviews.text: I use these for leg days at the gym, I usually go heavy, 300-400 on squat/deadlift. the support these give is amazing. No ankle rolling, no movement. Just a good solid platform. Seem good too for upper body and keeping the body balanced as well. I would definitely recommend these to gym lifters, not powerlifters.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a quality shoe. Might be a bit flashy for some, and I prefer leather over whatever this is. All and all, I would recommend it if you don't care about looks and don't need a shoe for a specific purpose other than comfort as they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepdoc

customer_reviews.title: Sexy looking
customer_reviews.text: This shows are sexy! Got them for my husband and he loves them! They are more for casual wear than workout, he says they are hard as far as for exercise use!
customer_reviews.author: Paola Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Bad man bad!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like shoes at all. Send them back and never heard anything
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the most comfortable shoes ever but not terrible either. The outside is easy to wipe off to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes but as luck would have it too ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but as luck would have it too small! Had them out of the box for about 1 minute and then right back in with return label.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hill

customer_reviews.title: They fit and perform well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes not knowing how under armour shoes would fit. These shoes fit very well and is good for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, as I've come to expect from Under Armour. I've worn UA trainers for about 8 years now. They do run about 1/2 size to small. But overall Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he absolutely loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: A670

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. I have wider feet so I ordered a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: JerryG

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. Pretty stiff right outta the box and could use more cushion. Hoping they'll fit a little more comfortably after they get broken in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Opsahl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great grip on soling
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great grip on soling. I started breaking these in this week and can already tell their good shoes. I usually go up one size for UA because a 12 for me is too tight, yet Nike's, Skechers & Adidas are just right. Well made, look sharp👍
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Palfy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: On the inside of one is not seen good and stabs the top of toe.
customer_reviews.author: ginger caskey

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and is comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and is comfortable right out of the box. I play ss and will say there’s a lot of slide as they aren’t grippy at all, but they are trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Han

product_meta.title: Under Armour Mens UA Yard Low Trainer
product_meta.description:
Under Armour cross training shoes are for the athletes who train and practice year round. Baseball isn't a seasonal sport, it's year round. With the UA yard trainer baseball shoes, your workouts will pick up a notch and your results will prove that. A synthetic leather and textile upper delivers a precise fit with a lightweight, comfortable feel. On the bottom, Under Armour's High-rebound SuperFoam helps absorp shock to the feet and a luxurious feel with every step. Between the two, a Charged Cushioning midsole transfers impact force into explosive power and speed. Under Armour: Protect This House! 

The UA Yard Trainer Baseball shoes also feature a non-marking rubber outsole that provides elite traction on practically any surface. You can pick up your pair of Under Armour training shoes today with fast, free shipping. We're here to bring the home court advantage to you!
